resources.string: Enter a name for your torch!
Sorry, there is already a torch with that name
To use Kyzr: Find a friend with an NFC-compatible Android device. Open up Kyzr. Tap the back of your phones together. Revel in the glory of having swapped torches. Profit.
About the Kyzr Team: We\'re a group of first-years studying Electrical and Computer Engineering at Olin College of Engineering in Needham, MA. Direct job offers to patrick@thekyzrproject.com
